fields.summary: we are trying to understand how agile works

fields.description:
You recently moved the more button to the right hand side of the screen, and made it three dots (...).

When doing actions and making changes such as workflow transitions, it makes a popup appear in the top right. This covers the more button and slows us down, we either need to close out of the popups, or wait for them to disappear, this is annoying.
fields.summary: ... (More button) gets covered by popups when saving.

fields.description:
*Background of the request*

Currently, we wont be able to disable or remove system plugin permanently.

If we disable the plugin, the plugin will be enable back once we restart the instance.
fields.summary: Option to remove or disable system plugin permanently
Export reports that use only current fliters and fields.  We don't use all fields, nor need to see every field we use in our exported reports. Much more efficient if it wasn't there.

fields.description:
*Background of the request*

Currently, Jira does not have the gadget that can help user to show how long a particular issue have been open.
fields.summary: Gadget showing how long an issue has been open

fields.description:
*Background of the request*

Currently, anonymous user will be able to view *space tool* option.

fields.summary: Please provide ability to use Translations plug-in for Atlassian Cloud.

fields.description:
Currently there isn't a way for people to follow/watch/subscribe for updates from Atlassian documentation.
 !JIRA.png|thumbnail! 


We need to turn the watch  feature back and ensure it is functional  like the following: 
 !p.png|thumbnail!
Plataforma Magento versão 1.9.2.4.
fields.summary: Criação do ambiente dev e-commerce Martins Peres

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Currently as a site-admin user has to go through a number of actions to figure out what permission/application access they might need to perform a certain action. From an administrative perspective this puts an unnecessary hurdle when trying to perform basic administrative task in the instance. As a site admin a user can add themselves to any permission scheme/group/or project role anyway. 

h3. Suggested Solution
Site administrators should have unrestricted access to the instance by default.
fields.summary: Site admins should have unrestricted access.

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
I used to have an icon for perma-link and an icon for Edit on the comments in a Jira ticket. To edit a comment I could simply click the Edit button.
Now both the perma-link and the Edit button are hidden behind a '⋯' button. It makes it less obvious where the Edit button is and it adds a click to get to the Edit function.

h3. Suggested Solution
Leave the buttons as they were previously.
fields.summary: New edit button does nothing but adding clicks

fields.description:
At this moment, there is no way to import bulk users at once to Atlassian Cloud aside from raising a support ticket with following [this instruction|https://confluence.atlassian.com/cloud/import-users-and-groups-744721626.html].

I found the similar feature requests about our server products.

* [Feature to Export and Import Users and Groups in JIRA|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/JRA-61614]
* [Bulk Add Users|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-19714]

On the other hand, the workarounds introduced in the feature requests don't work on Atlassian Cloud.
If we implement this feature, it might be helpful for our customers.

Cheers,
Yuki

https://itsphere.atlassian.net/webdav/backupmanager/JIRA-backup-20160808.zip 

how to download?

There are a couple things that make the current What's New confluence page [1] less than usable:
 * Watching the page for changes results in lots of emails that are either:
 ** Not relevant to me because I don't use every atlassian product
 *** My suggestion here is to split each product up into a sub-page that can be watched independently
 * The applications versions page [2] seems to suggest things are updated much more frequently than the What's New page suggests (e.g. JIRA Core updated on Aug 3 with no mention of that in What's New)
 ** My request here is to make sure these pages are accurate and fully transparent.

Thanks!

[1] [https://confluence.atlassian.com/cloud/what-s-new-686863216.html]
 [2] [https://confluence.atlassian.com/cloud/application-versions-687219181.html]

fields.summary: I've changed my email on atlassian account but it doesn't reflect to bitbucket account

fields.description:
Back when I started working in Atlassian I created a  Cloud Evaluation license 27-05-2013. Creating an "OnDemand" license was part of my CA training.

The instance is still running, which made me think of the possible number of Evaluators out there using free Cloud instances. Thoughts?
I signed up. Now what do I do?
This page will act as marketing page and for subscription for visitors.

Our organization would like to add features to the Confluence editor, but cannot add buttons to the editor toolbar menu.

See attachment for the desired button location.
 !Desired Button Location.PNG|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Add support for web items on the Confluence editor toolbar

fields.description: Before calculating the discount on the humidity should be checked that the value of humidity index is less than 100%. Otherwise, display the string with the error message: "Нumidity index can not exceed 100%!" (сonsider the current locale).
fields.summary: The humidity value can be more than 100% now!

fields.description:
I need to review a PR from one of my team members, and have instead been greeted with this screen after trying to log in with my google credentials.

This is not simplifying my login experience.  This is making me jump through hoops at a critical moment in product management.  Please get rid of this 'feature' ASAP and make google logins work as they did.
*steps to reproduce*
Джира ненадо так
is there any road map for SAML/ADFS tie in? various vendors are doing SAML for single sign on and also centralized account admin (also central lockout)...
Practice springs and hibernates

has broken rendering link
see screenshot

fields.summary: Can't change timezone in Atlassian ID page or BitBucket profile or Support page

fields.description:
I try to create a project and assign it to a category. But the only way to do it for the moment is to create the project and then to go to this project, and change the category in the administration page.

If it is possible to change "Create Project" fields, everyone will be available to choose the category or the permission schme for example.

Hi team,

I have a requirement from client where they need an update on ticket at every interval say 60 minutes.
In JIRA how can I create a loop for SLA where if I have updated the client by adding a comment it refreshes the SLA and updates again to 60 minutes

I was adding more details to my support request.  I had written a lot of text as a comment and then accidentally clicked on a  link on the page.  I was directed away from the support request page without warning.  When I went back, all of my text was gone.

Please add a confirmation message to the support request page when you are about to lose data by navigating away.
fields.summary: Add Confirmation Message to Support Request Page when navigating away

fields.description: When reviewing pages created by others, I often need to switch between giving inline comments and making changes on a page. When I go from reading mode to edit mode, the page position resets to top of page. With long pages, it can be time consuming to find back the position where I want to edit. When entering edit mode, Confluence should remember the page position wher I left off in reading mode
fields.summary: When entering edit mode, Confluence should remember the page position

fields.description:
I have previously created 2 sprints, but I currently cannot find them.

They do not appear in any board, but pop up when I try to assign a sprint to an issue, these two sprints appear as candidates.
Describe the steps for the login
xcvkzjxdbjvkzdfv jkDBZc ,HBc FLJBCl; fVSB
See attached screenshot. It happens from time to time on JIRA and Confluence (both on-demand).
fields.summary: Application Navigator is showing the wrong active application

fields.description: We have an approach to include all backlog items in epics, and in order to make some backlog refinement and reassign few tickets from one open Epic to the closed one, I click on {{Show done epics}} checkbox in EpicLink field, but nothing has happened. I tried to make this update in both available way: single ticket edit and bulk change - there is no way to move ticket from one epic to that was closed. Could you please fix this problem, since I don't see any value for having {{Show done epics}} checkbox in EpicLink field if it doesn't show anything. Thank you!
fields.summary: unable to select closed Epic in Epic Link dropdown field

fields.description:
1.Открываем страницу http://www.olstyre.ru/
2.В поле "Логин" вводим "Tolyan"
3.В поле "Пароль" вводим "123"
4.Нажимаем кнопку войти
Фактический результат: Неверное имя покупателя или пароль!
Ожидаемый результат: Вход в систему

Комментарий: Пользователь заранее зарегистрирован

1.Открываем страницу http://www.olstyre.ru/
2. Нажимаем "Зарегистрироваться"
3.Выбираем Физическое лицо
4. Нажимаем "Зарегистрироваться"
5.Во все поля вводим "!"
6.Вводим символы с картинки
Фактический результат: Регистрация прошла успешно
Ожидаемый результат: Ошибка полей " Фамилия, имя, отчество:" или всех полей сразу

1.Открываем страницу http://www.olstyre.ru/
2. Нажимаем "Зарегистрироваться"
3.Выбираем  Физическое лицо
4. Нажимаем "Зарегистрироваться"
5.Во все поля вводим "1"
6.Вводим символы с картинки

Фактический результат: Регистрация прошла успешно
Ожидаемый результат: Ошибка полей " Фамилия, имя, отчество:", "Ваш Email:"...

1.Открываем страницу http://www.olstyre.ru/http://www.olstyre.ru/
2. Нажимаем Скачать прайс-лист
Фактический результат: Ошибка 404
Ожидаемый результат: Скачивание прайс-листа

1. Запускаем приложение "Komus"
2.В меню нажимаем кнопку "Оплата"
Фактический результат: кнопка не работает
Ожидаем результат: кнопка должна работать, переход в меню "Оплата"

1. Запустить приложение Komus
2. Зайти в меню
3. Выбрать пункт меню "Доставка"
Фактический результат: нет кнопки возврата на главную страницу
Ожидаемый результат: возможность возвращения на главную страницу
fields.summary: В пункте меню "Доставка" отсутствует кнопка возврата на главную страницу

fields.description:
1. Запускаем приложения "Комус".
2. Поворачиваем экран в альбомное положение.
Фактический результат: иконки кнопок исчезают.
Ожидаем результат: меню читабельно и удобно для пользования.
fields.summary: При просмотре главной страницы в альбомном режиме иконки кнопок исчезают.

fields.description:
1. Запускаем приложения "Комус"
2. Переходим в главное меню
3. Нажимаем на кнопку "Определение местоположения"
Фактический результат: кнопка "Определение местоположения" не работает.
Ожидаем результат: кнопка "Определение местоположения" должна работать.

1. Запускаем приложения "Комус".
2. Выбираем пункт меню "Каталог".
3. Прокручиваем список.
Фактический результат: прокрутка списка не работает.
Ожидаем результат:  список должен прокручиваться.
fields.summary: В пункте меню "Каталог" прокрутка списка не работает.

fields.description:
1. Запуск приложения "Комус"
2. Переход в главное меню
3. Кликаем на ползунок "Определение местоположения"

ACT: Кнопка "Определение местоположения" не работает.

EXP: Ползунок кнопки "Определение местоположения" должен работать.
fields.summary: В главном меню не работает кнопка "Определение местоположения"

fields.description:

2. Выбор пункта "Каталог"
3. Скролим список.

EXP: подпункти в категориях меню должны прокручиваться.

Во всех друг пунктах меню аналогичная проблема.
fields.summary: Во всех пуктах меню с прокруткой подпукнтов скролинг не работает.

fields.description:
1. Запуск приложения "Комус"
2. Поворот экрана в ландшафтное положение.

ACT: Иконки пунктов меню мелкие.

EXP: Иконки кнопок должны быть пропорциональны и кликабельны.
fields.summary: При просмотре главной страницы в ландшафтном положении иконки кнопок очень мелкие и не кликабельны.

fields.description:
h2. Summary

Confluence is missing from the Application Navigator (hamburger menu). 

If you look at the Application Navigator configuration, you see that the Confluence link no longer exists there.

h2. Workaround

Users can navigate to https://<yoursite>.atlassian.net/wiki directly. 

*To fix the missing link*, an administrator can: 
# click on the Application Navigator (hamburger menu) and then select *configure...* 
# click on the refresh icon on the right hand side of the screen, above the table of application links 
# finally, refresh your browser window so the updated menu is loaded

 !hamburger_menu_refresh.jpg|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Confluence is missing from the Application Navigator (hamburger menu)

fields.description:
When I log in with my username and password in bitbucket, I redirected to the page to confirm an account in atlassian.

When I want to confirm entering the same password that bitbucket, I can not enter and tells me the password is incorrect.

I can not access my account and do nothing.

It looks from inside atlassian that plugins are enabled and configured correclty. But Zendesk is trying to "send an invitation" to Jira which keeps failing. Are you able to check my plugin settings to ensure that I have it setup correctly?
I've spent the last hour reading a ton of documentation but still can't figure it out.

Experiencing the issue using the JIRA Cloud service.. when i attempt to paste an image directly into a JIRA, nothing happens. (Where it used to automatically create an attachment, bring up a dialogue box naming the attachment with the default name "screenshot#' and create a link in the active field (if being pasted into a comment).

Last week i was able to Copy and paste images into the comments field; or directly into the attachments section using Chrome; now this week seems i am unable to do so. (In chrome, or any browser)

No issues copy and pasting text;
No issues copying and pasting images to/from the clipboard into other apps eg: Word.

Just seems to be an issue within JIRA that the pasting of images no longer functions.

Please fix/bring this functionality back; its save so much time and space pasting directly into JIRA as opposed to saving the file, then uploading..etc.
fields.summary: Pasting of images directly into Comments/Attachments section no longer working

fields.description:
1. Страница http://www.nibulon.com/data/zakupivlya-silgospprodukcii/kalkulyator-znizhok.html
2. В поле "Виберіть показник вологості, %:" вводим "50"
3. В поле "Виберіть показник сміттєвої домішки, %:" вводим "Йцукен"
4. Нажимаем кнопку "Рорзахувати"

ACT: поле "Виберіть показник сміттєвої домішки, %:" принимает данные без ошибки.

EXP: поле "Виберіть показник сміттєвої домішки, %:" не должен принимать буквенные значения.
fields.summary: Поле "Виберіть показник сміттєвої домішки, %:" принимает буквенные без значения.

Нажимаем кнопку "Рорзахувати"

fields.description:
Hi all,

after the update last Weekend (17.06.2016) the layout of the reports changed. Unfortunately not in a good way. To me this seems like a bug. Pleae investigate.

Thanks

STR:
1. Открыть ссылку http://pizza48.ru
2. Справа, в меню "КРК МегаПолис" выбрать пункт "Салаты -20%"
3. Справа, в меню "СД «pizza48.ru»" выбрать пункт "Пицца -20%"
4. Сравнить указание цен "Салаты -20%" и "Пицца -20%"
Expected result:
Цена должна указываться со скидкой и без скидки как в пункте "Пицца -20%" меню "СД «pizza48.ru»"
Actual result:
Цена указана неизвестно каким образом, со скидкой или без
fields.summary: Неизвестно какая указана цена салатов в меню "КРК МегаПолис", с учетом скидки или без.

fields.description: Unable to launch the clic-source

As QA when I am closing issue at that time, I am attached file or screen shot which is uploaded successfully on Close Issue screen but When Its saved it just include comment attached file will not display anywhere in the view screen.

Note: When I attached image on create time or direct paste in view screen, it will display properly.
fields.summary: From Close Issue screen, attached file is not display on view screen

fields.description:
Atlassian cloud sites that are asleep cannot be woken using the 'Wake it up' button. 

An error appears: 
{noformat}
Couldn't wake up
Sorry, something went wrong. Maybe try again?{noformat}

h2. Workaround

Please raise a request at https://support.atlassian.com so we can manually wake the site up for you.
fields.summary: Sites that are sleeping can't be woken up
